resources.string: I found a very good game for android, come to download it.
The goal of Fool Dig is to dig tunnels or makes road that lead the BBMan to the gold and his friends(Named "Ka"), then back to the tower platform.
Wow....The game really needs smart brains and high performance devices.
I had finish the tour, come to play the "Fool Dig" together
I had finish the season one, come to play the "Fool Dig" together
I had finish the season two, come to play the "Fool Dig" together
